name: Listened to QBs of the future & how boosters are taking advantage of NIL

content.html:
Stew and Bruce discuss what has unfolded since NIL became official on July 1st. College athletes are now doing endorsement deals from coast-to-coast and boosters who run businesses are also getting involved. For example, a Florida based MMA training facility owned by a Miami booster is paying every player on the Hurricanes up to 6k to endorse the gym. Fair or foul? Plus, Bruce recaps his trip to the Elite 11 QB camp. Who are the QBs of the future in college football? Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

By The Audible with Stew & Bruce: A show about college football
